cont.entity_a: Sounds great for blues and classical music. Produces room-filling sound with deep lows. Sound is deeper and fuller, enhancing the listening experience.
cont.entity_b: Improved audio quality significantly. Provides natural sound for music and movies. Excellent bass and sound quality.

cont.entity_a: Produces great lows, filling a large media room effectively. Bass can be adjusted well, providing clean, deep sound without distortion. Offers strong, punchy bass for under $150. Sufficient bass for a 15x20 open room with 12-foot ceilings.
cont.entity_b: Powerful bass that can rattle walls. Tighter bass compared to older Onkyo models. Fills large rooms with bass.

cont.entity_a: Installation is straightforward with RCA-to-RCA connection. Installation is easy with understandable documentation.
The box is large and somewhat heavy, but well built with a gorgeous finish.
cont.entity_b: Too big with non-removable grill and fuse issues. Rubberized feet are better than cheap plastic.

cont.entity_a: The auto on/off feature is unreliable.
cont.entity_b: Automatic shutoff works well. Auto-shutoff happens too quickly, causing cracking sounds. Automatically turns on with signal and off after inactivity.

cont.entity_a: Unbeatable value at the $100 price point.
Not ideal for large rooms as it doesn't rattle walls or handle ultra-low frequencies. Compact with solid build quality and clean look.
Crossover and volume controls are useful.
cont.entity_b: Adjustable frequency, volume control, and phase switch.

cont.entity_a: First subwoofer had a hum and didn't auto-off; the second distorts at low frequencies due to port design. Quality control issues, possibly not designed for lower-end frequencies. Has a load hum and blows fuses after seven months of use.
cont.entity_b: Replaced Polk PSW10 due to speaker cone damage. Pops when turning on and requires loud volume to activate.

cont.entity_a: Great for a living room application. Great addition to a home theater system with rich lows and tight punch.
cont.entity_b: Adds depth to music and movies.

cont.entity_a: Rattles the room, even in a small room. Fills rooms effectively on a low budget.
